channel.title: Tech tools I use on The Expat Tech

item.title: Tech Tools I Use
item.description:
Here’s a running list of the tools I rely on for aviation, nomading, and tech work.
I’ll keep adding to this page as I discover new gear and services.

Hardware

  • GL.iNet routers
  • Beelink mini PCs
  • Dell laptops

Software

  • Hugo for site building
  • VPN setups
  • Markdown editors

Services

  • GitHub for version control
  • Cloudflare for DNS
